content: cid 37 cid 40 cid 35 cid 46 cid 41 cid 40 cid 31 cid 38 cid 41 cid 48 cid 31 cid 41 cid 40 cid 31 cid 20 cid 71 cid 75 cid 74 cid 65 by lori b the bright side materials 1 skein dark side of the moon by alexandra-the art of yarn size 5 24 circular needle gauge 22 sts x 34 row = 4 finished measurements after blocking 67 x 14 notes this piece is knitted in stockinette stitch knit on the right side purl on the wrong side and is written for this particular yarn the dark side of the moon yarn is predominantly one color with one small portion of the hank dyed a different color or contrast color you will knit in stockinette stitch until you come to a stitch on your left needle that is the contrast color of the skein if you are knitting on the right side and come to the contrast color you will purl these stitches returning to the knit stitch when knitting the main color stitches if you are purling on the wrong side and come to the contrast color you will knit these stitches returning to the purl stitch when purling the main color stitches always k1 kfb yo at the beginning of each right side row no matter what the color always k2tog k1 at the end of each right side row no matter what the color instructions co 5 sts 1 - k1 kfb yo k2tog k1 2 purl 3 k1 kfb yo knit purl cc to the last 3 sts k2tog k1 4 purl knit cc repeat row 3 and 4 until approx 10 yards remain k1 kfb yo k2tog to the last 3 sts yo k2tog k1 bind off as follows p2 place these 2 sts back on the left needle and purl them together purl the next st place the 2 sts on the right needle back on the left needle and purl them together repeat to the end of the row tuck in ends wet blocking is recommended
